roleset.name: speedy
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6.

example.name: arg2
example.text: because the speed was not too fast ; but the other party were a truck after all , so the smashing of the truck 's doors was still very serious .

example.name: concatenation of arg1
example.text: Rockwell was fast to credit the help of others in the rescue.
example.arg: [Rockwell][to credit the help of others in the rescue]
